languages.text: "Когитатор за тем контейнером. Дальше! Это большая комната с песком, вы сразу ее узнаете".
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
languages.original_text: "Когитатор за тем контейнером. Дальше! Это большая комната с песком, вы сразу ее узнаете".

traits.locale_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."
"The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

languages.text: «El cogitador está justo detrás de ese contenedor. ¡Un poco más para allá! Es una zona grande llena de arena; la reconocerás en cuanto la veas».
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: «El cogitador está justo detrás de ese contenedor. ¡Un poco más para allá! Es una zona grande llena de arena; la reconocerás en cuanto la veas».

languages.text: “沉思者就在那边的集装箱上面，再远一点！那里有一片很大的沙地，只要看到就肯定能认出来。”
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: “沉思者就在那边的集装箱上面，再远一点！那里有一片很大的沙地，只要看到就肯定能认出来。”

languages.text: 「考算機がちょうどあのコンテナの向こうにある。少し離れている！大きな砂地だ。行けば分かるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: 「考算機がちょうどあのコンテナの向こうにある。少し離れている！大きな砂地だ。行けば分かるだろう」

languages.text: "Der Cogitator ist genau über dem Container. Etwas weiter noch! Ein großer sandiger Bereich. Ihr werdet ihn erkennen, wenn Ihr ihn seht."
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: "Der Cogitator ist genau über dem Container. Etwas weiter noch! Ein großer sandiger Bereich. Ihr werdet ihn erkennen, wenn Ihr ihn seht."

languages.text: « Le cogitateur est un peu plus loin, de l'autre côté de ce conteneur ! Il se trouve dans une vaste zone ensablée, impossible de le rater. »
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: « Le cogitateur est un peu plus loin, de l'autre côté de ce conteneur ! Il se trouve dans une vaste zone ensablée, impossible de le rater. »

languages.text: "Kavramsayar, şu konteynerin hemen üzerinde. Az daha ileride! Büyük bir kumluk var, görünce tanırsınız."
languages.original_text: "The cogitator is just over that container. A bit farther! It's a large sandy area, you'll know it when you see it."

traits.locale_text: "Kavramsayar, şu konteynerin hemen üzerinde. Az daha ileride! Büyük bir kumluk var, görünce tanırsınız."
